title: Ham and eggs with grilled tomato
description: Serve a few slices of sourdough bread with prosciutto, creamy scrambled eggs and grilled tomato for a lazy weekend breakfast or brunch.

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Preheat the griddle to hot. Slice the tomato in half, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, drizzle with oil and place on a grill pan with the prosciutto. Grill until the tomato is softened and the prosciutto is crisp.
Crack the eggs into a bowl. Season them with salt and pepper and beat well. Beat in the cream.
Pour the mixture into a non-stick pan and cook the scrambled eggs until they reach a sloppy consistency. Remove from the heat.
Pour the scrambled eggs onto the sourdough toast and place the grilled prosciutto on top. Arrange the grilled tomatoes on the side and serve.
